name: Eco Connect
description:
2D puzzle action game where saving coins is important!

Click on the top of a block to put a new block.
You can also put it on the top, bottom, left and right of the placed blocks.
Right-click and drag to put blocks in succession.
Placing blocks reduces coins.
If you goal while owning lots of coins, you can complete mission!
Go toward for the goal while saving coins!

----- Controls -----

< Menu >

* Mouse Cursor - Select
* Mouse Click - Decide

< Game >

* [A][D] - Move
* [W] - Jump
* Mouse Click - Put a new block
